text: Tharoo Oru Janmam Koodi is a 1978 Indian Malayalam film, directed by N. Sankaran Nair and produced by A. Ponnappan. The film stars Prem Nazir, Hema Choudhary,Sankaradi, T. R. Omana and K. P. A. C. Azeez in the lead roles. The film has musical score by G. Devarajan. ==Cast== *Prem Nazir *Hema Chodhary *T. R. Omana *K. P. A. C. Azeez *Daljit Kaur * Sankaradi *Kunchan *Lalu Alex *Nellikode Bhaskaran ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by G. Devarajan and the lyrics were written by Mankombu Gopalakrishnan. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Lyrics !! Length (m:ss) |- | 1 || "Raakkilikal Paadi" || P. Madhuri || Mankombu Gopalakrishnan || |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1978 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by N. Sankaran Nair
title: Tharoo Oru Janmam Koodi
